overview: We made Fisting Underground Part 1, and it got nominated for an award. We made Fisting Underground Part 2, and you thought we couldn't possibly get any filthier. How could we take that as anything other than a challenge? In Fisting Underground Part 3, we complete the hole-stretching, gut-punching trilogy with the kind of images you've never seen in your life, going deeper into the world of hardcore handballing than ever before. Imagine eight flesh-hungry men from all over the world all thrown into one vinyl playpen with nothing but buckets full of Slam Dunkâ„¢ lube, a mind-boggling variety of dildos, butt-plugs and freaky toys, and the energy to keep going until every ass in the room is filled to the brim, exhausted and happy. From growling bears like Tommy Rawlins and tattooed pigs like Violator to beautiful twinks like Aaron King and Danny Fox, FU3 will satisfy anyone.
title: Fisting Underground 3
